vote.title: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement for the purchase of lnfoblox a centrally managed Domain Name System, Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol, and lnternet Protocol Address space/Management solution for security monitoring and threat detection for the Department of Information and Technology Services with Netsync Network Solutions, Inc.  through the Texas Department of Information Resources cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $482,824.68 - Financing: Data Services Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
